dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares to trespass into the territory of the Rustborne Monstrosity?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking passage through your domain.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Such a feeble concept. What do you offer in return for safe passage?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a token of respect and promise not to disturb your slumber.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Ha! Mortals like you are all the same. Begone or face the consequences!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave peacefully, I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic mortal. Your fear is palpable. Leave now or face the fury of the Plague Ooze!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to be threatened by a mere slime. Face me if you dare!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for one so fragile. Prepare to be consumed by the plague's embrace!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no offerings for the likes of you, I demand safe passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demand? No one demands of the Rustborne Monstrosity! You will regret your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my tone, I seek only to pass through peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now. Prepare to face the wrath of the Plague Ooze!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not bow to a mere Ooze. Let's settle this now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you bring destruction upon yourself. Embrace your demise!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have a gift, a rare potion that can enhance your power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power? The Plague Ooze needs no enhancements from the likes of you. What trickery is this?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: No trickery, just a gesture of goodwill. Take it as a sign of peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? An amusing notion, but futile. Your fate is sealed by daring to cross us.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fine, suit yourself. My offer was genuine, but your loss.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your attempts at diplomacy are useless. Prepare for the wrath of the Plague Ooze!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge your dominance, Rustborne Monstrosity!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge? Mortals are so full of delusions. Do you seek death?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear nothing! Face me in combat, if you dare!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words from one who will soon be defeated. Prepare to be eradicated by the Plague Ooze!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I was mistaken, I seek no conflict. I will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mistaken indeed. Leave now, or suffer the consequences of your foolishness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I bring news of a greater threat, we should unite against it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity? The Rustborne Monstrosity needs no alliances. What do you propose?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join forces with me against the approaching danger. Alone we will fall.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliances are for the weak. We stand alone, as we have always done.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, stay blind to the impending doom. I will find others stronger.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words hold no weight. Leave now or face the consequences of your ignorance.
